caption: Very popular place! Has new menu item - GyuDon, which was sold out by the time I ordered it! Great place for take-out bento!

I come here often for their bento and spicy ahi combo. I used to eat the udon salad which is also great, but I’ve been sticking to the other items which have a bit more protein in them.  The bento here is great and provides a lot of various flavors in them. My favorite is the grilled chicken because it’s spicy and not fried. The grilled chicken is a bit salty though at times. The karaage and katsu/tonkatsu is great too. The spicy ahi is creamy and delicious and the combo comes with a salad.  I miss the days when this shop actually used to serve sushi. But, I’m still happy with the food that they serve.
